body:
Comment 6: 
I've never been happy about the name and stutter of:

pkg crypto/tls, func DialWithDialer(*net.Dialer, string, string, *Config) (*Conn, error)

I can live with it, but I think a tls.Dialer struct that embeds a *net.Dialer and
contains a *tls.Config would be nicer. Then the curried tls.Dialer.Dial method fits the
shape needed by e.g. the http.Transport.Dial func hook, and is consistent with the
net.Dialer struct + method.

But otherwise I'm happy with the rest.
